sense.gloss: to become rusted together, to become rusted shut
to rust, to become (completely) rusty, to be covered with rust
to become rusty (of a skill or ability), to become less effective
paying for one's mistakes, getting one's just deserts, suffering the consequences (of one's own actions), reaping what you sow

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑身↑↓み↓から↑出↑↓で↓た↑錆↑↓さび↓だ。
sdata.e: You have no one but yourself to blame.

sdata.j: ほら、↑錆↑↓さび↓で↑金属↑↓きんぞく↓がどんどん↑腐食↑↓ふしょく↓しているよ。
sdata.e: Hey, rust is eating away the metal.

sdata.j: そのはしごは↑埃↑↓ほこり↓と↑錆↑↓さび↓で↑覆↑↓おお↓われていた。
sdata.e: The ladder was covered with dust and rust.

sdata.j: ↑錆↑↓さび↓が↑鉄↑↓てつ↓を↑虫↑↓むし↓↑食↑↓は↓むのと↑同様↑↓どうよう↓に↑心配↑↓しんぱい↓は↑心↑↓こころ↓を↑虫↑↓むし↓↑食↑↓は↓む。
sdata.e: As rust eats iron, so care eats the heart.

sdata.j: この↑車↑↓くるま↓は↑錆↑↓さび↓に↑強↑↓つよ↓い。
sdata.e: This car is resistant to rust.

sdata.j: この↑鋼↑↓はがね↓は↑錆↑↓さ↓びない。
この↑金属↑↓きんぞく↓は↑錆↑↓さび↓とは↑無縁↑↓むえん↓です。
sdata.e: This metal is free of rust.

sdata.j: ガレージは↑錆↑↓さ↓びている。
↑彼↑↓かれ↓はやすりで↑錆↑↓さび↓を↑落↑↓お↓とした。
sdata.e: He rubbed the rust off with a file.

words.gloss: to become rusted together, to become rusted shut
